mapper.insert: insert into IM_METADATA_COLUMN (PK_ID, MD_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIBE, TYPE, LENGTH, NOTE, INDEXED, PRIMARY, STORED) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{length,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indexed,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{primary,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{stored,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update IM_METADATA_COLUMN set MD_ID = #{mdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIBE = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LENGTH = #{length,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INDEXED = #{indexed,jdbcType=CHAR}, PRIMARY = #{primary,jdbcType=CHAR}, STORED = #{stored,jdbcType=CHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, MD_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIBE, TYPE, LENGTH, NOTE, INDEXED, PRIMARY, STORED from IM_METADATA_COLUMN
